title: Enhancing Nursing Practice Competencies: Social Learning Course Based on Desktop VR Signal Effects

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts of social phenomena with 85% accuracy by utilizing visual signals provided in VR simulations.
Learners can transfer and apply case studies presented in signal-supported VR environments to real-world work scenarios with over 70% applicability.
Learners can compare cognitive load differences based on the presence or absence of signal effects using experimental data.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
